import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, Disclosure, Menu, Popover, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import {AiFillCloseCircle,AiFillDownCircle} from 'react-icons/ai' import './index.css' import axios from 'axios' import {useEffect} from 'react' const sortOptions = [ { name: 'Most Popular', href: '#', current: true }, { name: 'Best Rating', href: '#', current: false }, { name: 'Newest', href: '#', current: false }, ] const filters = [ { id: 'category', name: 'Category', options: [ { value: 'new-arrivals', label: 'All New Arrivals', checked: false }, { value: 'tees', label: 'Tees', checked: false }, { value: 'objects', label: 'Objects', checked: true }, ], }, { id: 'color', name: 'Color', options: [ { value: 'white', label: 'White', checked: false }, { value: 'black', label: 'Black', checked: false }, { value: 'blue', label: 'Blue', checked: false }, { value: 'red', label: 'Red', checked: false }, { value: 'green', label: 'Green', checked: false }, ], }, { id: 'sizes', name: 'Sizes', options: [ { value: 's', label: 'S', checked: false }, { value: 'm', label: 'M', checked: false }, { value: 'l', label: 'L', checked: false }, ], }, ] const activeFilters = [{ value: 'objects', label: 'Objects' }] function classNames(...classes:any) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function Filter() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const [checkedStatus,setCheckedStatus] = useState(false) const colors = ['white','black','red','yellow','green']; const colorss = [ {value:'white',checked:false}] const size = ['6','6.5','7','7.5','8','8.5','9','9.5','10','10.5'] const brand = ['Puma','Adidas'] const sort = ['Price low to high', 'Price high to low'] const [filterByColor,setFilterByColor] = useState([]) const [filterTrial,setFilterTrail] = useState([]) const handleChange=(e:any)=>{ if(e.target.checked==true){ filters.map((f:any)=>f.options.map((o:any)=>{if(o.value == e.target.value){o.checked = true}})) setFilterByColor([...filterByColor,e.target.value]); } else{ //filterByColor.map((color:any) => console.log(color)) filters.map((f:any)=>f.options.map((o:any)=>{if(o.value == e.target.value){o.checked = false}})) setFilterByColor(filterByColor.filter((item:any) => item !== e.target.value)); } //console.log(e.target.value) } const handleFilterChange=(e:any)=>{ if(e.target.checked==true){ if(colors.includes(e.target.value)){ console.log("yes") } } } console.log(filterByColor) useEffect(()=>{ const fetchFilterByColor=async()=>{ const res = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3333/product/filter/byColor?color=${filterByColor.map((f:any)=>f).join("&color=")}`) console.log(`http://localhost:3333/product/filter/byColor?color=${filterByColor.map((f:any)=>f).join("&color=")} `) console.log(res.data) /*const res = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3333/product/filter/byColorAndSize?${filterByColor.map((f:any) => filters.map((ff:any)=>if(ff.options.value==f){(ff.id=='color')?('color=h'):('size=h')}))}`)*/ } fetchFilterByColor() },[filterByColor]) return (
{/* Mobile filter dialog */} {/* */}
{/*

Filters

*/} {/* Filters */} {/*
{filters.map((section) => ( {({ open }) => ( <>

{section.name}

{section.options.map((option, optionIdx) => (
))}
)} ))}
*/}
{/* Filters */}
{/*

Filters

Sort
{sortOptions.map((option) => ( {({ active }) => ( {option.name} )} ))}
{filters.map((section, sectionIdx) => ( {section.name}
{section.options.map((option, optionIdx) => (
handleChange(e)} //onChange={option.checked?(e)=>{console.log("hello "+e.target.value)}:(e)=>{console.log(e.target.value+" is")}} defaultChecked={option.checked} className="h-4 w-4 border-gray-300 rounded text-indigo-600 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
))}
))}
*/}
Sort
{sort.map((option, optionIdx) => (
handleFilterChange(e)} //onChange={option.checked?(e)=>{console.log("hello "+e.target.value)}:(e)=>{console.log(e.target.value+" is")}} className="h-4 w-4 border-gray-300 rounded text-indigo-600 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
))}
Colors
{colors.map((option, optionIdx) => (
handleFilterChange(e)} //onChange={option.checked?(e)=>{console.log("hello "+e.target.value)}:(e)=>{console.log(e.target.value+" is")}} className="h-4 w-4 border-gray-300 rounded text-indigo-600 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
))}
Size
{size.map((option, optionIdx) => (
handleFilterChange(e)} //onChange={(e)=>handleChange(e)} //onChange={option.checked?(e)=>{console.log("hello "+e.target.value)}:(e)=>{console.log(e.target.value+" is")}} className="h-4 w-4 border-gray-300 rounded text-indigo-600 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
))}
Brand
{brand.map((option, optionIdx) => (
handleFilterChange(e)} name={option} defaultValue={option} type="checkbox" //onChange={(e)=>handleChange(e)} //onChange={option.checked?(e)=>{console.log("hello "+e.target.value)}:(e)=>{console.log(e.target.value+" is")}} className="h-4 w-4 border-gray-300 rounded text-indigo-600 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
))}
{/* Active filters */}

Filters , active

{activeFilters.map((activeFilter) => ( {activeFilter.label} ))}
) }
